elements.text:
Your boss tells everyone that tomorrow you'll divide into small groups to plan out new work projects. She also says that you'll have to pick your group, but you realize you don't have any close friends in your workplace.

Here are some behaviors that someone might do at that moment or in the future:

texts: I'll want to skip, but I'll go anyway and cope with feeling anxious.
I'll ask others to be in their group, even if I really don't want to.
During the discussion, I'll do my best to include everyone in our group conversation.
I'll pretend to be sick and just won't go to the discussion.
I'll make sure that I know what projects I'm interested in planning before tomorrow's meeting.
